ValidationRule.description: If the Account Name contains "Nokia OYJ" then it is valid account name else if contains "Nokia" the it is invalid
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(OR( $Profile.Name = 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name = 'Data Loader Profile', $Profile.Name = 'Integration API Only Profile' )), CONTAINS(LOWER(Account.Name), LOWER($Setup.CH_AccountName__c.CH_InvalidName__c)), NOT(LOWER(Account.Name) = LOWER($Setup.CH_AccountName__c.CH_ValidName__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The selected account is not valid for authorization.
